name: Crane Creek Inn Waterfront Bed and Breakfast

reviews.title: A wonderful find
reviews.text: I stumbled on the Crane Creek Bed & Breakfast and was pleasantly surprised. I had a wonderful stay and for the price, I would give this inn an excellent rating. The owners are very friendly and have thought of everything to make you feel at home. This is a great place for those who live out of town but have to come into Melbourne on occasion to work and usually stay at the traditional hotels. You will be quite spoiled at the Crane Creek.

reviews.title: Great B&B to relax = Crane Creek Inn!!
reviews.text: Beatiful place, clean rooms, well appointed, great hosts. Food was lovely. Terrific for a relaxing weekend to just unwind! Walking distance to great little shopping district & reaturants!! The views are super! Manatees - so terrific!!

reviews.title: Loved Crane Creek Inn
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at the Crane Creek Inn for my mom's birthday celebration. Every room was extremely clean. The view was absolutely beautiful. Bob and Gillian were extremely accomodating and very willing to help plan anything that we needed for the birthday weekend. We would definitely stay there again!

reviews.title: Great place to spend a weekend.
reviews.text: Very attractive Inn, comfortable rooms, great service, and a very helpful staff.

reviews.title: Loved the Crane Creek Inn
reviews.text: The owner of this B&B is there to please. The inn is immaculate, quaint and beautiful. Bob the owner, ensures his guests are well taken care of. He was an excellent host and his recommendations on restaurants were outstanding. This is the best b&B I have ever stayed in. Will definitely visit him again. The inn is located in the heart of Historic Melbourne and is walking distance to local restaurants and shops.

reviews.title: Beautiful but....
reviews.text: The inn is beautiful and well maintained. It is immaculate and peaceful, except about every 20 minutes in the middle of the night when the train comes through about 100 yards from the inn. There literally are train tracks behind the inn. If you are staying more than one night you will get accustomed to the noise if not you may be in for a long night. Bring earplugs.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.text: This place is awesome! It is very peaceful and relaxing - with everything you need at your fingertips! I strongly encourage you to visit Bob and Gillian when traveling to Melbourne for business or pleasure.

reviews.title: Loved the Crane creek Inn
reviews.text: We just spent a long weekend at Crane Creek Inn. This is our 2nd visit. We enjoyed it. The rooms were perfect. We had a great view of the Crane Creek. The bed was quite comfortable. Daily maid service was exceptional. They even umpacked our suitcases and put everything in it's proper place. The hot tub outside by the river was quite enjoyable. The wildlife was great. Turtles in the creek, fish jumping, birds flying over. Rowing teams use the creek as do fishermen. Breakfast was wonderful each morning something different. The hosts Bob and Gillian were very friendly and helpful with the local activities. It was a last minute trip and quite relaxing and refreshing.

reviews.title: Crane Creek Inn-Fantastic!
reviews.text: Top Notch, excellent hosts, nice amenities, spotlessly clean.

reviews.title: Quiet, Serene Get Away @ a B & B
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our week stay. CC Inn was a quiet, perfect get away. Would recommend it to friends and plan on going back this year and the next.

reviews.title: Most Perfect Place on Earth
reviews.text: Not only is the atmosphere perfect (we saw 3 manatee, water birds galore, a large gator!, crue boats, fish and more) but Bob is the most amazing inn keeper ever. He makes you feel welcome in his community and if you dont know anyone when you arrive, you will know everyone by the time you leave! The rooms are wonderful, the handmade soap to die for, breakfast is just the right thing. Little porch areas, niches, the hot tub and front porch swing provide the perfect setting for your romantic weekend. 10 stars!!

reviews.title: First rate
reviews.text: The inn is well located in central Melbourne, Bob is a gracious host, and the creek makes a lovely view. Everything gleams; breakfast is beyond generous. The mattress in our room was one click soft for my Spartan taste.

Crane Creek Inn is a great place for getting away. Bob was an excellent host providing us with information about local attractions and shops and helping us with anything we needed. Breakfast and housekeeping were outstanding; the rooms were nicely decorated and the grounds were beautiful. Just park your car and enjoy downtown Melbourne. We'll be back soon!
reviews.title: Special place for a getaway weekend
Great bed and breakfast
reviews.text: A wonderful pet friendly inn with a great location to the old part of Melbourne (can walk to everything). Saw manatees, gators, and dolphin every day. Gracious hosts, clean, nice pool and yard setting, with plenty of places to walk the dog. We will return.

reviews.title: Loved the Crane Creek Inn
reviews.text: Feb 27, 2006 - The Crane Creek Inn is a definite repeat! Stuningly beautiful location on Crane Creek; most gracious and helpful host; comfortable, well appointed amenities; great beds. We'll be back!

reviews.title: Best of The Best B&B in Melbourne
reviews.text: Beautifully appointed rooms overlooking Crane Creek in downtown Melbourne. Bob Shearer is a fantastic host and will go out of his way to please. Beautiful pool and hot tub.

reviews.title: beautiful place, perfect location
reviews.text: crane creek inn is a quaint spot next to a wonderful, old florida main street full of great restaurants and fun shops. it has a terrific view of crane creek and is walking distance to a marina along a quiet river walk. we would stay here again in a minute. the innkeeper bob does a great, but not intrusive, job of making you feel welcome.

reviews.title: Beautiful, peaceful and relaxing retreat
reviews.text: I have been to the Crane Creek Inn twice and enjoyed both stays. The first visit was for pleasure during the holidays and the Inn was decorated beautifully. The second visit was for the funeral of my father-in-law and Bob got us into a great suite at the last minute and was very kind to us. We will stay again I'm sure.

reviews.title: Spectacular
reviews.text: What a refreshing experience from beginning to end. I only wish we could have stayed longer. One morning, my husband and I jumped in the hot tub, which is on a boardwalk right on the creek. How peaceful. Our room, had a shower with two shower heads. Various types of coffee, teas and snacks were always available. As well as a wonderful fresh-cooked breakfast.

description: Crane Creek Inn Bed & Breakfast is the Melbourne area’s only true waterfront boutique Bed & Breakfast, and the only B&B with a heated, full size swimming pool. We are located directly on the water and an easy 1 block stroll to Historic Downtown Melbourne.Why drive to dinner and/or drinks? At Crane Creek Inn you can walk to over 10 fine dining and casual restaurants, and over 8 relaxing and fun bars/clubs – most with live music. Our beautiful, tree-lined Downtown also has four blocks of unique shops and boutiques; from Antiques to Fine Art, Women’s clothing, jewelry and more.Our Guests are awestruck by our beautiful grounds, and the serene pleasure of observing the manatees, bottlenose dolphin, alligators, and over 50 species of birds from our waterfront boardwalk while enjoying a complementary beverage (adult or otherwise). Bring your kayak or have one delivered for a truly unforgettable experience on the water.We offer our Guests an abundance of amenities. Our Guest rooms, each uniquely decorated with a tropical, Key West flair, all have private entrances and private baths. Luxurious 700 thread count linens on our Queen and King beds and top of the line soaps, shampoo and conditioners. Most rooms have a private deck or patio with very comfortable furniture for breakfast dining or just relaxing with a good book. And bubble away your stress in our hot tub, located on the water’s edge.Unlike many B&B’s that offer only 1 or 2 hot breakfast options, we want our Guests to have choices, and allow you to choose from over 10 hot breakfast options daily. Also included daily are fresh fruits, juices, cereals and sides.Crane Creek Inn offers complimentary 24-hour beverage service, which includes sodas, water, coffee, tea, beer and white and red wine (please drink responsibly). We also offer free Wi-Fi; free off-street parking; a free library of books and DVD’s; free Melbourne airport shuttle; beach chairs, towels & umbrellas; public computer, printer, copier and Fax.So say goodbye to the boring and crowded hotel scene, and let Andy & Bambi pamper you at Crane Creek Inn Bed & Breakfast.
